question: Which organisation granted a special refinance package of Rs.50000 Cr to the National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development (NABARD), the Small Industries Development Bank of India (SIDBI) and National Housing Bank (NHB)?
explanation:
The Reserve Bank of India has recently granted a special refinance package of Rs.50000 Cr to All India financial institutions (AIFI) such as the National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development (NABARD), the Small Industries Development Bank of India (SIDBI) and National Housing Bank (NHB).
Due to the financial crisis witnessed by the AIFIs, they could not mobilise resources from the market. Rs 25,000 crore is granted to NABARD for refinancing regional rural banks, cooperative banks and micro finance institutions. Rs 15,000 crore is given to SIDBI for on-lending and Rs 10,000 crore is given to NHB for supporting housing finance companies.
